thread.title: Clean, central London hotel
thread.title_full: Clean, central London hotel - Review of Holiday Inn Express London - Victoria, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Katerina P
title: Clean, central London hotel
text: We paid Â£90 for a night including breakfast. I think this is more than reasonable price for what it is. The receptionist welcomed us with a smile, explained everything, including what time is the breakfast. We came to our room, everything was clean, bed was very comfortable. The breakfast was quite simple; croissants, cereals, yogurts & full English breakfast, you could also chose gluten free and soya milk if you are on a special diet. We went for a walk around London, and didn't have to use the underground at all because of the location of the hotel. Overall, it is not a Ritz but if you want to stay in the city centre and not feeling guilty of spending too much money but still indulge yourself with a clean and nice hotel, go for this one. I'd also recommend to sign up for their membership, so you can collect points and get better prices than on booking.com
